description: A plugin that enables access to the arXiv.org API to search for academic papers.

operations.name: search_papers
operations.description: Search for papers on arXiv.org based on the provided query.

inputs.name: max_results
inputs.description: The maximum number of results to return.

outputs.name: papers
outputs.description: A list of dictionaries containing information about the papers.

authors.description: A list of authors of the paper.

summary.description: The summary or abstract of the paper.

link.description: The URL to the PDF of the paper.
